Bob Brooks
2323 Huntoon
Topeka, Kansas
May 9* I960
Mr, Sam Becker
Chairman, Radio, Television
and Film Division
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Mr, Becker:
As a thesis project, I have undertaken a study of religious broadcasting
on educational stations, I have included a copy of the questionnaire I
am presently using for my pilot study and pre-test. I intend to alter
certain questions, but basically this is the questionnaire I intend to
send to managers of educational stations.
At this point I feel that the study might have some significance other
than qualification for a Masters Degree. I have written to a number of
men in the field of religious broadcasting. So far, I have found no
evidence that a study of this type has been done previously. Therefore,
it might prove of some value to the NAEB.
I have selected the active members of the NAEB for my universe. I
intend to contact both educational radio and television stations.
Mr Gail Adkins of the University of Kansas has worked with me as thesis
adviser! Also, Mr. R. Edwin Browne, Station Manager of KANU is on my
thesis committee. At their suggestion, I write you this letter in order to
obtain the approval of the NAEB of my questionnaire.
I am sincerely interested in this project. I attended a graduate
Presbyterian seminary for a year and a half and am deeply interested in
religious broadcasting. I am presently finishing requirements for a Masters
Degree in radio and television at the University of Kansas.
Please feel free to comment on the questionnaire if you wish.
Sincerely,
/3k
Bob Brooks
Department of Radio and Television
University of Kansas
